historical:
Prior Codifications

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-99, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-1201.01.

For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-247, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-1201.01.

DC CODE § 3-1210.07

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Any person who violates any provision of this chapter shall, upon conviction, be subject to imprisonment not to exceed 1 year, or a fine not to exceed $10,000, or both.
Any person who has been previously convicted under this chapter shall, upon conviction, be subject to imprisonment not to exceed 1 year, or a fine not to exceed $25,000, or both.

title.text: District of Columbia Boards and Commissions. (Refs & Annos)
